oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. How Can Women Aid In Obtaining A Uniform Marriage and Divorce Law? (2 of 2)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: French. How Can Women Aid In Obtaining A Uniform Marriage and Divorce Law? Page 2 of 2. Lizzie Crozier French Papers.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Legislation; Women's rights;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: THE FIRST THING NECESSARY TO BRING ABOUT UNIFORMITY OF MARRIAGE AND DIVORCE LAWS IS TO HAVE THOSE LAWS MADE AT THE NATIONAL INSTEAD OP AT 48 STATE CAPITALS. WE MUST WIPE OUT STATE LINES IF WE WOULD INAUGURATE MANY DESIRED REFORMS. MR WILSON BEGAN THIS WHEN HE APPLIED THE ARTISTS GUM IN HIS SUSCESSFUL EFFORT IN PASSING THE INTERSTATE CHILD LABOR LAW. CONGRESS WILL MAKE THE LINE FAINTER WHEN IT PASSES THE PROHIBITION LAW. AND THIS NEXT CONGRESS WILL NO DOUBT MAKE IT ENTIRELY DISAPPEAR WHEN IT PASSES THE FEDERAL AMENDMENT FOR WOMAN SUFFRAGE. WHEN THE WOMEN ARE ENFRANCHISED THEY MAY GO TO WORK IN EARNEST TO PROTECT THE HOME AND AMONG THEIR FIRST ACTS WILL BE THE MARRIAGE LAWS WHICH CON- STITUTE THE FOUNDATION OF THE HOME.
